summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirtieth Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from East Columbia Street to East Denny Way, by constructing therein sewers of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other necessary appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 462 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
